nodes.title: Unite Shampoo 7 Seconds (10oz)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Starting with 7SECONDS™ Shampoo, a moisture-enriched shampoo that cleanses and protects hair from UV rays, thermal damage and color fading. Fall in love in 7SECONDS™!

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo 7 Seconds (Liter)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Starting with 7SECONDS™ Shampoo, a moisture-enriched shampoo that cleanses and protects hair from UV rays, thermal damage and color fading. Fall in love in 7SECONDS™.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner 7 Seconds (8oz)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. The perfect complement to 7SECONDS™ Shampoo, 7SECONDS™ Conditioner adds another level of brilliant shine and protects hair from UV rays, thermal damage and color fading. Shine in 7SECONDS™!

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner 7 Seconds (Liter)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. The perfect complement to 7SECONDS™ Shampoo, 7SECONDS™ Conditioner adds another level of brilliant shine and protects hair from UV rays, thermal damage and color fading. Shine in 7SECONDS™!

nodes.title: Unite Masque 7 Seconds
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Give your hair the gift of ultimate protection and moisture with this conditioning masque. After 10 minutes with the 7SECONDS™ Masque, your strands will be nourished from roots to ends with long-lasting shine, softness, and manageability. Get healthy in 7SECONDS™.

nodes.title: Unite 7 Seconds Detangler (travel 2 oz)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Nourish and fortify your hair with this leave-in detangler. A must-have for chemically treated hair, 7SECONDS™ Leave-in Detangler seals the cuticle and protects from heat and UV. Tangles gone in 7SECONDS™!

nodes.title: Unite 7 Seconds Detangler (8 oz)
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Nourish and fortify your hair with this leave-in detangler. A must-have for chemically treated hair, 7SECONDS™ Leave-in Detangler seals the cuticle and protects from heat and UV. Tangles gone in 7SECONDS™!

nodes.title: Unite 7 Seconds Blowout Creme
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. 7SECONDS™ BlowOut Crème will blow your mind, and your hair. Its blow-controlling formula extends the life of your blowout by eliminating frizz, leaving hair smooth and shiny without buildup. Blow by blow your brush will effortlessly glide through hair, keeping strands protected and perfected for a long-lasting finish. So go on, and blow on, and on, and on.

nodes.title: Unite 7 Seconds Glossing Spray
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Glossy hair is just 7SECONDS™ away with 7SECONDS™ Glossing Spray, an anti-humectant shine spray. Get thermal protection and long-lasting shine when you apply this dry, airy spray.

nodes.title: Unite 7 Seconds Refresher
nodes.description: Only takes 7 seconds to make a great first impression – make it count with our award-winning 7SECONDS™ hair system. Get the look of freshly washed hair without ever stepping in the shower. This dry shampoo absorbs excess oil without causing build-up in 7SECONDS™, leaving hair fresh and clean. Use 7SECONDS™ Refresher proactively, while hair is clean, or before bed, to help keep oil under control.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Boing Curl
nodes.description: BOING™ Curl Shampoo’s hydrating, cream-to-foam formula gently cleanses while restoring elasticity and shine, leaving curls healthy, hydrated and frizz-free.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Boing Curl
nodes.description: Keeping you in the loop is easy with BOING™ Curl Conditioner. Its targeted-hydration penetrates deep into hair shaft restoring and locking in moisture for strong, frizz-free curls.

nodes.title: Unite Boing Leave-in Detangler
nodes.description: BOING™ Curl Leave-In de-tangles, protects and refreshes curly hair by delivering moisture-retaining proteins and vitamins deep into hair roots, leaving hair hydrated, shiny and frizz-free.

nodes.title: Unite Boing Defining Curl Creme
nodes.description: BOING™ Defining Curl Cream moisturizes, defines and holds curls in place. Its coconut-infused formula activates curls by delivering nutrients deep into the hair shaft, restoring and sealing in moisture – curls stay controlled, defined and frizz-free.

nodes.title: Unite Boing Moisture Curl Creme
nodes.description: BOING™ Moisture Curl Cream keeps hydration in and humidity out. Its coconut and Argan Oil blend quenches and controls thirsty curls by delivering intense moisture to roots – curls stay hydrated, healthy and frizz-free.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Boosta
nodes.description: Need a boost? Lather up with BOOSTA™ Shampoo, a rich, thick, luxurious shampoo that builds body and weightless volume. Your hair will be left moisturized with a healthy, beautiful sheen.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Boosta (Liter)
nodes.description: Need a boost? Lather up with BOOSTA™ Shampoo, a rich, thick, luxurious shampoo that builds body and weightless volume. Your hair will be left moisturized with a healthy, beautiful sheen.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Boosta
nodes.description: Seal in moisture and ensure long-lasting body with BOOSTA™ Conditioner – it’s the perfect chaser to BOOSTA™ Shampoo. Strands stay shiny, and roots stay lifted after using this indulgent formula.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Boosta (Liter)
nodes.description: Seal in moisture and ensure long-lasting body with BOOSTA™ Conditioner – it’s the perfect chaser to BOOSTA™ Shampoo. Strands stay shiny, and roots stay lifted after using this indulgent formula.

nodes.title: Unite Boosta Volumizing Spray (8oz)
nodes.description: Need a lift? BOOSTA™ Volumizing Spray, a body-building volumizing spray gives hair a boost of weightless volume, especially when used with heat. The end result: a healthy sheen and enhanced texture.

nodes.title: Unite Boosta Thickening Creme
nodes.description: Get your thick fix with BOOSTA™ Thickening Crème, a volumizing styling crème that instantly adds thick, touchable volume to fine or limp hair. Its lightweight formula leaves hair looking, feeling, and behaving incredibly thicker and fuller.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Lazer Straight
nodes.description: Smooth away frizz and control curls with LAZER Straight™ Shampoo. It smoothes the cuticle and adds shine without weighing hair down.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Lazer Straight (Liter)
nodes.description: Smooth away frizz and control curls with LAZER Straight™ Shampoo. It smoothes the cuticle and adds shine without weighing hair down.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Lazer Straight
nodes.description: The perfect complement to LAZER Straight™ Shampoo. LAZER Straight™ Conditioner smoothes and tames frizz and flyaways, leaving hair straight and shiny.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Lazer Straight (Liter)
nodes.description: The perfect complement to LAZER Straight™ Shampoo. LAZER Straight™ Conditioner smoothes and tames frizz and flyaways, leaving hair straight and shiny.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo U Luxury
nodes.description: Treat yourself to U LUXURY® Shampoo, a rich and decadent shampoo packed with beneficial ingredients like argan oil, organic Hawaiian white honey, and crushed pearl powder. Nutrient-starved hair is left healthy, voluminous and full of shine.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner U Luxury
nodes.description: Complement U LUXURY® Shampoo with U LUXURY® Conditioner. Heal and repair your hair while locking in nutrients with this luxurious formula. Let the argan oil, organic Hawaiian white honey, crushed pearl powder, shea butter, apples, oranges, lemons and sugar cane pamper your hair.

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Blonda Toning
nodes.description: BLONDA™ Toning Shampoo is designed to get blonde tones and highlights lighter and brighter in just one minute. This ultra-violet formula gently cleanses, purifies, and neutralizes unwanted brassy tones. And the best part is it lasts through several shampoos, especially if you pair it with our BLONDA™ Daily Shampoo.

nodes.title: Unite Conditioner Blonda Daily
nodes.description: BLONDA™ Daily Conditioner is formulated to moisturize and maintain blonde hair every day – on both tone AND no-tone days. This color-protecting conditioner will soothe, refresh and moisturize hair without any blonde-dulling heavy residues. Hair is left silky, shiny and cool, just like you!

nodes.title: Unite Shampoo Weekender
nodes.description: Environmental elements and daily product usage can wreak havoc on even the healthiest strands. Wash your hair once a week with WEEKENDER™ Shampoo to deep clean without removing its natural oils.

nodes.title: Unite Lazer Straight Relaxing Fluid
nodes.description: Defeat and control curls, tangles and frizz with this relaxing fluid. Even the most difficult manes can be straightened with LAZER Straight™, all the while protecting hair from heat styling tools. Defy humidity with your LAZER Straight™ hair.

nodes.title: Unite Creamy Paste
nodes.description: Shape, create, originate. Gain lift, add thickness, create texture, get slick or define curls – CREAMY Paste™ does it all. Use a little to get piece-y separation, or use a lot to create bold definition. The more you use, the more it holds—your hair, your choice.

nodes.title: Unite EXPANDA Volume Root Energizer
nodes.description: Watch your mane go from flat to full with this powerful volumizer. EXPANDA™ Volume gains styling control over your hair by boosting lift and support directly from the root. Works on all hair types.

nodes.title: Unite Elevate Mousse
nodes.description: Not your mother’s mousse. ELEVATE Mousse’s innovative, weightless cream foam lifts your hair into a full-bodied, frizz-free style that’s soft, shiny and moveable. Argan oil for added thermal and UV protection keeps hair healthy and lifted with lasting shine, all the time.

nodes.title: Unite Blow & Set Lotion
nodes.description: Lift, curl, sculpt, smooth, shape—this sculpting lotion does it all. Style and set with BLOW&SET™ Lotion, the most versatile wet style product in your hair arsenal. And as an added bonus, enjoy extra shine and volume, too.

nodes.title: Unite U Oil
nodes.description: Want silky smooth and healthy hair? Then U Oil is the product for you. Get weightless moisture and instant shine without build-up. Made with Argan oil, it repairs, seals, and protects hair from blow drying, flat ironing and/or curling. It’s even light enough to use on fine hair. Use on wet or dry hair. Great for everyday use.

nodes.title: Unite Conundrum Paste
nodes.description: Wax, paste or cream? CONUNDRUM Paste™ makes the answer easy… all the above. This styling cream boasts the benefits of a wax, paste, and cream, all in one magical pot! Create a flexible hold that’s messy, sleek or anything in between, and it will last all day. Use on wet or dry hair.

nodes.title: Unite Smooth & Shine Cream
nodes.description: Infused with argan oil, SMOOTH&SHINE™ styling cream will give you a smooth, sleek look with a high-gloss finish. And the nutrient-rich formula enhances hair health. Use on wet or dry hair.

nodes.title: Unite Liquid Volume Spray
nodes.description: Build body, instantly, without adding weight. Sound like a miracle? This texturizing spray performs! LIQUID Volume delivers weightless volume, texture and workable hold on wet or dry hair, with or without heat.

nodes.title: Unite Beach Day
nodes.description: Get that beachy look without leaving your bathroom. BEACH Day™ styling/texturizing spray gives you full, tousled hair in minutes—effortlessly. Use on wet or dry hair.

nodes.title: Unite Second Day Cream
nodes.description: Craving that textured look that comes the day after you shampoo? Get tomorrow’s hair, today, with SECOND Day™, a weightless finishing cream that leaves hair with a lived-in, earthy texture you can wear immediately — no 24-hour wait required.

nodes.title: Unite Expanda Dust
nodes.description: Ready for some serious lifting? Lightly sprinkle EXPANDA™ Dust onto roots and massage into scalp for instant root volume or dust throughout hair for added texture. A little puff of dust goes a long way!

nodes.title: Unite Texturiza Spray
nodes.description: Never fall flat with TEXTURIZA™ Spray, a volume and texture spray that lasts all day, and night. This dry, translucent finishing spray delivers weightless volume and texture that’s both workable and buildable. Great for all hair types. Use on dry hair only.

nodes.title: Unite Tricky Spray Finishing Wax
nodes.description: TRICKY Spray would have made Houdini want to be a hairdresser. Shine, hold and manipulation—all in ONE magical finishing tool! This blend of a 50% hair spray and 50% wax is designed for medium to thick hair and allows for hold you can still style.

nodes.title: Unite Tricky Lite Finishing Spray
nodes.description: A little wax, a little hold, and a lot of shine! This lighter version of Tricky Spray delivers shine, hold and style-ability, just in a lighter formula. The perfect finishing wax for fine to medium hair, TRICKY Lite won’t weigh down your strands. For extra control, spray directly onto brush and then distribute into hair.

nodes.title: Unite Max Control Spray
nodes.description: You’re in control with MAX CONTROL Spray, a strong-hold, dry setting spray. Defy gravity and freeze frame your style with a brushable, flake-free formula.

nodes.title: Unite GO365 Hairspray
nodes.description: Is it possible to have three hair sprays in one convenient bottle? It is with GO365™ Hairspray. Just turn the nozzle to your desired strength—soft, medium or strong setting — and spray away!

nodes.title: Unite Session-Max Hairspray
nodes.description: Session stylists around the world rely on this extra-strong hairspray to keep runway styles and cover models’ hair perfectly in place. Its maximum-hold formula guarantees your look stays put all day (and night) long. You’ll immediately understand why SESSION-MAX™ Spray is a hair professional’s first choice.

nodes.title: Oribe Featherbalm Weightless Styler
nodes.description: Style, shine and weightless control. Specially developed for finer hair textures, this ultra-light balm smoothes and hydrates while imparting a hint of hold to blowouts, air-dried textures and finished styles that need a little polish.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-Up Spray (Blonde)
nodes.description: Instantly cover greys and roots or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-Up Spray (Dark Brown)
nodes.description: Instantly cover greys and roots or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-Up Spray (Platinum)
nodes.description: Instantly cover roots and greys or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-Up Spray (Red)
nodes.description: Instantly cover roots and greys or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: Oribe AirStyle Flexible Finish
nodes.description: Soft, flexible texture and a moisturizing satin finish: Our whipped-crème confection is an elegant shortcut to next-day hair and subdued frizz, with separation that can be reworked.

nodes.title: Oribe Après Beach Wave and Shine Spray
nodes.description: Attention island-hoppers and champagne-poppers: Get beach-to-bombshell hair—tousled, touchable waves with sun-kissed shine—without the salty stiffness. Our moisturizing glamour spray uses rich extracts and exotic oils for lush repair and sultry texture.

nodes.title: Oribe Balm d’Or
nodes.description: Shield your hair from thermal damage. This superlight styler with heat-activated polymer technology and healing cassis, sandalwood and maracuja oils protects and nourishes fragile strands, sealing in sleekness and radiant shine while you blow-dry, straighten or curl.

nodes.title: Oribe Bright Blonde Radiance & Repair Treatment
nodes.description: Stay bright with our restorative silkening treatment specially formulated for blondes. This lightweight concentrate repairs and prevents damage, brittleness and split ends leaving hair ultra-soft while violet pigments tone to keep brassiness at bay.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: This rich, restorative conditioner extends the life of your dye while soothing over-processed, color-treated hair (you know who you are). Enhanced environmental protection keeps color-sapping UV rays at bay.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner for Magnificent Volume
nodes.description: Because you should always think big. This body-building gel-cream moisturizer provides uplifting support for effortless combing, styling, glamorizing.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo for Intense Moisture & Control
nodes.description: Control the uncontrollable. This extra-rich conditioner tames and softens even the coarsest locks with a unique blend of flower and plant extracts. Lasting, weightless moisture silkens and detangles, preparing your hair for a life without frizz.

nodes.title: Oribe Creme for Style
nodes.description: Superior style and substantial shine are a quarter-size dollop away. This stylists’ staple offers firm yet flexible all-day hold and tames frizz with rich moisturizers. Loves curly and straight hair equally.

nodes.title: Oribe Curl Gelee for Shine & Definition
nodes.description: Soft, sexy, youthful curls don’t always come naturally. This elegant activator adds amazing texture and definition, with shine-boosting, frizz-eliminating, crunch-free satin hold that enhances your sultriest asset.

nodes.title: Oribe Curl Gloss
nodes.description: Curl without crunch. This lightweight glossing gel shapes and shines for ultra-hydrating control. A blend of Brazilian extracts, including passion flower, jicama and cupuacu fight humidity and deeply condition for soft yet defined curls that hold all day.

nodes.title: Oribe Fiber Groom
nodes.description: This new-age fiber paste fuses silken strands with next-generation polymers to create an airy blend of bounce, separation, and elastic hold.

nodes.title: Oribe Flash Form Finishing Spray Wax
nodes.description: Create weightless, buildable texture with control and lasting hold. This ultra-fine wax mist adds style, separation and sheen to short cuts and long lengths.

nodes.title: Oribe Free Styler Working Hair Spray
nodes.description: The stylist’s tool of choice, this ultra-fine, ultra-dry mist can be layered, styled and reworked to perfection. Spray over finished looks for light, brushable hold with a touchable, satin finish.

nodes.title: Oribe Gel Sérum
nodes.description: Forget what you know about gel. This magical, gold-flecked potion with active moisturizing agents brings sophisticated hold with shine rather than stiffness. Gorgeous.

nodes.title: Oribe Glaze for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: A high-gloss top coat for hair. This shimmering, conditioning glaze imparts intense shine, brightens color and highlights, and silkens strands for hair that is luminous from the inside out.

nodes.title: Oribe Gold Lust Dry Shampoo
nodes.description: Instantly clean. Extend your blowout and prevent damage with our transformative dry shampoo. Absorbs product buildup, oil and impurities with translucent powders while soothing scalp and restoring strength and softness. Fragrance-retention technology means our signature scent stays with you all day.

nodes.title: Oribe Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil
nodes.description: This luxuriously light oil absorbs instantly to restore hair to its prime. Infused with a rich blend of jasmine, edelweiss flower, lychee, sandalwood, cassis, bergamot and argan extracts, each protective drop penetrates the hair to deeply condition, strengthen and smooth—imparting intense nourishment and incredible shine. Works wonders on dry, damaged and color-treated hair…Liquid gold.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner Gold Lust Repair & Restore
nodes.description: Discover the fountain of youth for soft, shiny, ageless hair. Blending time-honored oils and extracts—cypress, argan and maracuja—with our revolutionary bio-restorative complex, this ultra-hydrating conditioner softens and revitalizes, smoothing each cuticle to undo the damage of time (and style).

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo Gold Lust Repair & Restore
nodes.description: Reawaken your hair to its glossiest, healthiest prime. This rejuvenating cleanser combines centuries-old healing oils and extracts—cypress, argan and maracuja—with our revolutionary bio-restorative complex to balance the scalp and reinforce the inner strength of each strand.

nodes.title: Oribe Masque Gold Lust Transformative
nodes.description: This truly modern remedy penetrates to rebuild each fiber with curative white tea, baobob and jasmine extracts and our bio-restorative complex, improving elasticity and fortifying hair to rediscover its softness, body and inner brilliance. Restore overworked hair to its prime with each dose.

nodes.title: Oribe Grandiose Hair Plumping Mousse
nodes.description: Each luxe pouf gives hair an exaggerated sense of body and structure, without the slightest hint of crunch. All-day memory leaves styles supremely soft yet set, for hair that’s thicker, fuller, larger than life.

nodes.title: Oribe Imperial Blowout Creme
nodes.description: Our transformative blowout crème, formulated with skincare technology, creates a full, flawless, iconic Oribe blowout that lasts for days while styling in strength, density, softness and shine. This ultra-nourishing formula smoothes away signs of damage and aging for hair that looks and feels healthier and younger after just one use.

nodes.title: Oribe Impermeable Spray
nodes.description: This anti-humidity finishing spray shields hair from frizz on the sultriest of days (and nights), protecting sleek blowouts and perfect curls alike. Miami-tested.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner for Intense Moisture & Control
nodes.description: This deeper-than-deep conditioner instantly and intensely treats even the coarsest locks for damage repair and effortless detangling. Hair becomes ultra-soft, ultra-silky and smoother than ever. Now that’s intense.

nodes.title: Oribe Masque for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: Add life and shine to your hair with the latest color-maintenance technology. Intense, cuticle-enriching conditioning, color-protecting UV filters and next-generation frizz-taming bio-polymers supercharge this color-enhancing, hair-repairing, glossifying masque.

nodes.title: Oribe Matte Waves Texture Lotion
nodes.description: Get salt-spray waves, sans dryness. This medium-hold lotion coaxes matte-textured pieciness out of even the finest hair, adding grip to styles and a beachy allure.

nodes.title: Oribe Maximista Thickening Spray
nodes.description: Bigger is better. This thermal-protective body-builder helps you expand to your absolute fullest with enduring lift and hold.

nodes.title: Oribe Masque Moisture & Control Deep Treatment
nodes.description: Treat your curls right. Our ultimate moisturizing masque, with coconut and almond oils, quenches thirsty curls and prevents breakage while repairing damage. Hair is left silky, hydrated and healthier than ever.

nodes.title: Oribe Mystify Restyling Spray
nodes.description: Prolong your style while protecting your strands. This hydrating spray reactivates yesterday’s products to restyle while nourishing, strengthening and shielding against thermal damage.

nodes.title: Oribe Priming Lotion Leave In Conditioning Detangler
nodes.description: Ease your routine. This silky, leave-in conditioning lotion instantly detangles to ease combing and prevent breakage. Our ultra-hydrating formula, with cupuacu and mango seed butters, moisturize and smooth strands for healthy, beautiful curls that are prepped for styling.

nodes.title: Oribe Rough Luxury Soft Molding Paste
nodes.description: An ultra-pliable molding paste that smoothly slips through hair before taking hold for definition, texture and shine. Lends a soft touch to short cuts and long layers alike.

nodes.title: Oribe Royal Blowout Spray
nodes.description: For the ultimate blowout. This ultra-lightweight mist smoothes even the worst-behaved mop while speeding dry time. It also repairs split ends, nourishes, softens and strengthens the hair, giving it healthy body and shine.

nodes.title: Oribe Run Through Detangling Primer
nodes.description: Instant gratification: This lightweight conditioning detangler primes hair for immediate glide-through combing, leaving strands silky soft and incredibly touchable. Our cuticle-sealing formula protects hair from damage caused by heat styling and comb-resistant knots.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner Serene Scalp Balancing
nodes.description: This calming conditioner balances it all, deeply hydrating and soothing the scalp while removing loose dandruff flakes. Our ultra-nourishing formula quenches parched strands and unwinds tangles, revealing softer, silkier hair

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo Serene Scalp
nodes.description: Do away with dandruff. This gentle treatment cleanser, formulated with salicylic acid, relieves and prevents dandruff while soothing dry, itchy, irritated scalp. The result: healthy, hydrated hair with no trace of flakes.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: An ultra-gentle cleanser for ultra-beautiful color. Extend the bright, happy life of your dye with high-tech ingredients that target damaged areas for intense moisture treatment and protect your hue from the elements.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo for Magnificent Volume
nodes.description: Because everyone needs a little largesse. Body-building polymers wash in truly uplifting volume and thickness, while rare botanical extracts leave hair full, lush, strong and easy to love.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner Signature
nodes.description: Oribe spared nothing in crafting this restorative daily moisturizer. Hydrating polymers revive youthful shine for lustrous, healthy locks and detangle for ease of combing throughout the day. Conditioner just got luxurious. Enjoy.

nodes.title: Oribe Masque Signature Moisture
nodes.description: A super-rich indulgence. This crème de la crème deep-hydrating masque transforms even the driest, most over-it hair, leaving it supremely soft and irresistibly touchable.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo Signature
nodes.description: Every morning should start with a little indulgence, such as this rich daily cleanser, custom-blended from the most exclusive ingredients to silken, detangle and protect. Prepare your hair for glamour.

nodes.title: Oribe Split End Seal
nodes.description: Gone are the days of choosing between beautiful color and luxuriantly healthy hair. This serious silkening serum and split-end mender is clinically proven to restore, fortify, and preserve tresses of every shade.

nodes.title: Oribe Straight Away Smooth Cream
nodes.description: This powerful perfecting cream protects against heat and humidity for super sleek strands that still have body and movement. Blowouts become quicker, more manageable and alluringly enduring.

nodes.title: Oribe Superfine Hair Spray
nodes.description: A sheer, modern hairspray with medium hold. Oribe designed Superfine to bring new technology to old-style glamour, resulting in flexible, brushable, shiny-soft control. The exclusive ultra-dry finish won’t dampen or dull smooth styles.

nodes.title: Oribe Superfine Strong Hair Spray
nodes.description: Superfine’s super strong sibling takes hair spray to the next level, locking in must-hold styles with lustrous, natural shine.

nodes.title: Oribe Supershine Light Moisturizing Cream
nodes.description:
A luxe reinvention of leave-in conditioner, this supreme cream satisfies the thirstiest hair, calming frizz, elevating shine and restoring hair to supernatural softness.

Specially designed for fine-to-medium and extra-long hair.

nodes.title: Oribe Supershine Moisturizing Cream
nodes.description:
A luxe reinvention of leave-in conditioner, this supreme cream satisfies the thirstiest hair, calming frizz, elevating shine and restoring hair to supernatural softness.

Especially loved by medium-to-thick and extra-long hair.

nodes.title: Oribe Swept Up Volume Powder
nodes.description: Reach new heights. Our texturizing root-lift powder instantly adds buildable grip and style. The zero-mess sprayer creates amplified updos and dramatic volume.

nodes.title: Oribe Thick Dry Finishing Spray
nodes.description: Plump up the volume with this high-density finishing spray that inflates hair for extra thickness and lushness. Oribe’s secret for hair that is big, beautiful, beyond luxurious.

nodes.title: Oribe Dry Texturizing Spray
nodes.description: Bigger, better, full-on glamorous hair. This invisible dry hair spray builds in incredible volume and sexy texture. Patented polymers absorb oil at the roots, leaving you with just-styled hair for days (and nights).

nodes.title: Oribe Power Drops Damage Repair Booster
nodes.description: Supercharge your hair care. This highly concentrated treatment serum provides an intense dose of essential nutrients to rebuild and restore dry, damaged, time-weakened hair. Formulated with linoleic acid, biotin and sea kelp extract, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands.

nodes.title: Bio Iconic Gold Pro Curling Iron 1″
nodes.description:
Bio Ionic GoldPro Curling Iron 1″ with 24-carat gold barrel smoothes and curls hair leaving it feeling soft to the touch. The 24-carat gold barrel help distribute heat evenly through hair while the mineral complex seals moisture in. The digital temperature control makes it easy to regulate to desired heat levels. Benefits:1″ Barrel. 24K Gold barrel ensures even heat distribution. Ceramic Mineral Complex infuses moisture and condition. BioCeramic Heater locks in style. 

Digital temperature control up to 450-degrees F. 
Type: Ceramic Curling Irons 
Size: 1 inches

nodes.title: Bio Iconic Gold Pro Curling Iron 1.25″
nodes.description:
Bio Ionic GoldPro Curling Iron 1.25″ with 24-carat gold barrel smoothes and curls hair leaving it feeling soft to the touch. The 24-carat gold barrel help distribute heat evenly through hair while the mineral complex seals moisture in. The digital temperature control makes it easy to regulate to desired heat levels. Benefits: 1.25″ Barrel. 24K Gold barrel ensures even heat distribution. Ceramic Mineral Complex infuses moisture and condition.BioCeramic Heater locks in style. 
Digital temperature control up to 450-degrees F. 
Type: Ceramic Curling Irons 
Size: 1.25 inches

nodes.title: Bio Ionic Long Barrel Curling Iron 1.25″
nodes.description: 2″ longer barrel than average for longer hair and ease with back of head styling. Cool touch grip for easy curling. Variable heat setting for various hair types.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-Up Spray (Black)
nodes.description: Instantly cover roots and greys or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: OLAPLEX No.3 Hair Perfector
nodes.description: A treatment, not a conditioner, that reduces breakage and visibly strengthens hair, improving its look and feel.

nodes.title: OLAPLEX No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo
nodes.description: Protects and repairs damaged hair, split ends and frizz by re-linking broken bonds. A highly-moisturizing, reparative shampoo that leaves hair easy to manage, shiny and healthier with each use.

nodes.title: OLAPLEX No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner
nodes.description: Protects and repairs damaged hair, split ends and frizz by re-linking broken bonds. A highly-moisturizing, reparative conditioner for all hair types that leaves hair easy to manage, shiny and healthier with each use. Color-safe. Strengthens & leaves hair stronger than ever.

nodes.title: OLAPLEX No.6 Bond Smoother
nodes.description:
A leave-in reparative styling creme eliminates frizz, hydrates & protects all hair types.

This concentrated leave-in smoothing cream is excellent for all hair types including colored and chemically treated hair. OLAPLEX N°6 strengthens, hydrates, moisturizes and speeds up blow-dry times while smoothing. Eliminate frizz and flyaways for up to 72 hours.

nodes.title: OLAPLEX No.7 Bonding Oil
nodes.description: A highly-concentrated, weightless reparative styling oil. Dramatically increase shine, softness, and color vibrancy. Minimizes fly-aways and frizz.  Provides heat protection of up to 450°.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo for Brilliance and Shine, 8.5 oz./ 251 mL
nodes.description: Lather in lasting luster and elegant polish. This moisturizing shampoo highlights the chicest sheen for the ultimate illumination. So Brilliant

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner for Brilliance and Shine, 6.8 oz./ 200 mL
nodes.description: Condition in brilliance. This fortifying polishing treatment magnifies shine and unteases tangles without making hair dull in any way. Now go dazzle them.

nodes.title: Airbrush Root Touch-up Spray (Light Brown)
nodes.description: Instantly cover roots and greys or revive highlights between appointments. Microfine pigments blend seamlessly with your natural shade when—and where—you need it. The quick-drying powder formula also absorbs dirt and oil to refresh hair.

nodes.title: Oribe Serene Scalp Exfoliating Scrub
nodes.description: Reveal the secret to a healthy scalp. This powerful scrub gently polishes scalp with exfoliating beads to remove oil, dirt and product buildup while a blend of alpha hydroxy acids and fruit extracts cleanses pores and nourishes hair. Scalp is left primed and deeply purified.

nodes.title: Oribe Serene Scalp Thickening Treatment Spray (4.2 oz)
nodes.description: High-density at your fingertips. Our powerful treatment for thinning hair is proven to leave hair feeling thicker, fuller and healthier. The ultra-lightweight formula instantly plumps hair at the root while creating denser-looking strands over the course of three months.

nodes.title: Oribe Serene Scalp Leave-on Treatment
nodes.description: Instant relief. This lightweight and fast-absorbing, leave-on treatment removes loose dandruff flakes while cooling mint and calming chamomile soothe and balance the scalp.

nodes.title: Boar Bristle Brush – Ibiza Hair EX4 65mm
nodes.description: For volume, ideal for the crown of the head and medium to long hair. EX Series. Extended Cork Handle. The EX series is the most innovative design in ergonomics in a round brush EVER! Light weight and easy to maneuver. Extra dense reinforced boar for the practitioner of high performance styling. Ibiza Hair mixes natural boar bristle with a unique carbon fiber heat resistant nylon. GripSlip technology. Made in Spain.

nodes.title: Curling Wand – UNITE Pro-System 3-in-1
nodes.description:
Get twisted. UNITE Pro-System 3-in-1 Curling Iron has 3 Tourmaline Infused Ceramic Barrel attachments ranging from .75” – 1.25”. Tourmaline Infused Ceramic Barrels increase shine, reduces frizz and helps resist humidity. Two quality PTC heaters create fast, reliable and constant heat. Professional 9 ft. Length Swivel Cord allows freedom to move without getting tangled and dual Voltage 100-240V For Worldwide Use.

Three Barrel Attachment
0.75 inch (19mm) | 1 inch (25 mm) | 1.25 inch (32mm)
Includes Glove with Silicone Bumps
For use with barrels during styling

nodes.title: Oribe Silverati Illuminating Pomade
nodes.description: Brighten in style. Build in sculptural texture and control with our flexible pomade, specially formulated for silver, grey and white tones. Unique silver pigments highlight and add glossy shine while conditioning agents revitalize brittle strands

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo Silverati
nodes.description: Stay sterling. Specially formulated for grey and white strands, our illuminating shampoo undoes dullness and yellow tones, revealing softer, brighter, perpetually vibrant hair.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner Silverati
nodes.description: Find the silver lining. Our brightening, intensely-hydrating conditioner banishes dullness and yellow tones while restoring youthfulness, elasticity and shine.

nodes.title: Oribe Masque Silverati Illuminating treatment
nodes.description: Transform grey, silver and white strands with this powerfully moisturizing treatment masque. Our ultra-softening formula restores strength, elasticity and shine while calming and hydrating dry scalp. Corrects yellow tones and leaves locks beautifully illuminated.

nodes.title: Oribe Shampoo Bright Blonde for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: Immediately illuminate blonde and silver hair. This revitalizing violet shampoo corrects brassiness and yellow tones while brightening natural highlights for hair that is healthier, shinier, lit from within.

nodes.title: Oribe Conditioner Bright Blonde for Beautiful Color
nodes.description: Restore brightness and shine to blonde and silver hair. This deeply nourishing violet conditioner corrects brassiness and yellow tones while imparting strength, softness and sheen for hair that is truly enlightened.

nodes.title: Unite Blonda Oil
nodes.description: BLONDA™ Oil is specially formulated just for blondes. This deeply hydrating oil shines, seals, and protects hair from frizz, heat & UV damage. It quickly smooths dry and damaged ends, AND reduces blow-dry time. It’s a must-have for all blondes and a must-must-have for bleached blondes!

nodes.title: Oribe Rock Hard Gel
nodes.description: A modern cream-gel for intense hold, architectural styling and shine. Hair does exactly what it’s told—whether spiked or slicked—and stays that way. Enriched with light-reflecting particles and hair-strengthening compounds.

nodes.title: Oribe Rough Luxury Molding Wax
nodes.description: Detailed styles get thoroughly modern texture with this flexible paste wax. Loved by layers for its volumizing hold that adds substantial softness, separation and semi-matte luster.

nodes.title: Oribe Curl Control Silkening Creme
nodes.description:
Offering the perfect balance of hold and moisture, this silk-light crème glides through hair to style and nourish with ultra-hydrating avocado, apricot and coconut oils. Curls and waves are given instant, touchable definition, with all-day
frizz-control and support

nodes.title: Oribe Curl Shaping Mousse
nodes.description: This call to curls locks in locks while leaving them supple and shiny—never stiff. Sealed-in moisture and hydrating frizz resistance are the light-as-air pièce de résistance

nodes.title: Oribe Gold Lust Pre-Shampoo Intensive Treatment
nodes.description: Bring damaged locks back to life. This rejuvenating pre-shampoo treatment balm melts into hair, deeply moisturizing and repairing while protecting against harsh aggressors such as washing, styling and pollution. Softness, shine and strength are restored.

nodes.title: Oribe Volumista Mist for Volume
nodes.description: Get hair higher with this weightless mane-plumping mist. New age polymers swell each hair shaft for incredible lushness, natural body and brilliant luster.

nodes.title: Boar Bristle Brush – Ibiza Hair EX5 80mm
nodes.description:
For soft loose curls, big volume, large sections. Ideal for long hair and back sections. Surprisingly amazing for bobs to create soft natural volume.

EX Series. Extended Cork Handle. The EX series is the most innovative design in ergonomics in a round brush EVER! Light weight and easy to maneuver. Extra dense reinforced boar for the practitioner of high performance styling. Ibiza Hair mixes natural boar bristle with a unique carbon fiber heat resistant nylon. GripSlip technology. Made in Spain.

nodes.title: Instant Root Fix L’Oreal Professional – Dark Brown/Black
nodes.description: Temporary root concealer spray to instantly cover greys and lasts 1 shampoo.

nodes.title: Instant Root Fix L’Oreal Professional – Light Brown
nodes.description: Temporary root concealer spray to instantly cover greys and lasts 1 shampoo.

nodes.title: Bio Ionic Long Barrel Curling Iron 1″
nodes.description: 2″ longer barrel than average for longer hair and ease with back of head styling. Cool touch grip for easy curling. Variable heat setting for various hair types.

nodes.title: Oribe Styling Butter Curl Enhancing Creme
nodes.description: Style richly. This deeply nourishing crème instantly melts into hair and defines coily curls. A blend of shea butter and avocado oil hydrates hair to protect from breakage and control frizz. Strength, softness and hold are at your fingertips.

14 karat gold fill chain, freshwater pearl, Cubic Zirconia

Handcrafted (with love) in San Francisco

Healing powers of Pearl - Pearl is a protection stone, and brings the gentle healing power of the sea. It is a stress relieving stone; relaxing, soothing and calming to the emotions. Pearl stimulates intuition, imagination, sensitivity and adaptability. It helps our emotions become more harmonious and balanced.

24 karat gold overlay

Handcrafted (with love) in San Francisco

14 karat gold fill, 14 karat gold vermeil charm

nodes.title: Necklace – Micro Stone in Gold
nodes.description: Good things come in small packages, like our gold-filled necklaces, approximately 16.25″-16.5″ long

nodes.title: Blow Dryer – Bio Ionic Powerlight
nodes.description:
Bio Ionic’s PowerLight™ Pro Dryer is both powerful and light! Nanoionic™ Minerals infused into the barrel of the dryer emit natural negative ions that break down water molecules. The micronized water molecules penetrate hair for extreme hydration, leaving it silky and smooth.

1875W Professional dryer cuts down drying time

Bio Ionic Moisturizing Heat conditions hair while you style creating soft, healthy, frizz-free results

Lightweight, for comfortable all day use

5 year warranty

nodes.title: Brush – Ceramic + Ion Thermal Hairbrush Olivia Garden 2 1/8″
nodes.description: Synthetic bristle thermal brush features a vented ceramic barrel for faster and more consistent styling.

nodes.title: Brush – Ceramic + Ion Thermal Hairbrush Olivia Garden 3 1/2″
nodes.description: Synthetic bristle thermal brush features a vented ceramic barrel for faster and more consistent styling.

nodes.title: Boar Bristle Brush – Ibiza Hair G4 65mm
nodes.description:
For volume, ideal for the crown of the head and medium to long hair..

G Series. Swirled bristles, ideal for coarse and frizzy hair. Swirled sparse bristles allow coarse hair to get wrapped around the bristles easier than with uniform bristles. Swirled bristles are also great for spinning the brush to create texture, waves and smoothness. The G series mixes natural boar bristle with a unique carbon fiber heat resistant nylon. GripSlip technology. Made in Spain.

nodes.title: Boar Bristle Brush (set of 3) – Bio Ionic Boarshine
nodes.description:
Includes small, medium and large.

Bio Ionic Boarshine Brush is a renewable 100% natural boar bristle brush that features unique 45 degree angled bristles to smooth the hair and enhance shine

nodes.title: Smith & Cult Nail Polish – Top Coat
nodes.description:
Vegan

8-Free Formula: No Dibutyl Phthalate, Toluene, Formaldehyde, Formaldehyde Resin, Camphor, Xylene, Ethyl Tosylamide, & Triphenyl Phosphate

Gluten-Free

nodes.title: LITER – Signature Shampoo
nodes.description: Every morning should start with a little indulgence, such as this rich daily cleanser, custom-blended from the most exclusive ingredients to silken, detangle and protect. Prepare your hair for glamour.

nodes.title: LITER – Brilliance & Shine Conditioner
nodes.description: Condition in brilliance. This fortifying polishing treatment magnifies shine and unteases tangles without making hair dull in any way. Now go dazzle them.

nodes.title: LITER – Brilliance & Shine Shampoo
nodes.description: Lather in lasting luster and elegant polish. This moisturizing shampoo highlights the chicest sheen for the ultimate illumination. So Brilliant.

nodes.title: LITER – Magnificent Volume Conditioner
nodes.description: Because you should always think big. This body-building gel-cream moisturizer provides uplifting support for effortless combing, styling, glamorizing.

nodes.title: Necklace Extender – Gold
nodes.description: Chain extenders made of 14 karat gold fill. Add to our 16″ Necklaces – ideal for achieving a layered look.

nodes.title: LITER – Beautiful Color Conditioner
nodes.description:
This rich, restorative conditioner extends the life of your dye while soothing over-processed, color-treated hair (you know who you are). Enhanced environmental protection keeps color-sapping UV rays at bay.

Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse.

nodes.title: LITER – Beautiful Color Shampoo
nodes.description: An ultra-gentle cleanser for ultra-beautiful color. Extend the bright, happy life of your dye with high-tech ingredients that target damaged areas for intense moisture treatment and protect your hue from the elements.

nodes.title: Oribe Cote d’Azur Hair Refresher 2.25oz
nodes.description: A mist of our signature fragrance refreshes hair, neutralizes odors and cuts static. From now on, what you’ve been up to is your (beautifully) scented secret.
